title: The Firefighter's Advance
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), (detailed illustration), 3D Anime style, a dramatic full-body portrait of a brave male firefighter, centered, walking forward through heavy gray smoke and glowing embers. He wears a red helmet with '150' visible, a gas mask/respirator, and thick protective bunker gear with yellow reflective stripes. He is actively holding a hose nozzle, spraying a powerful, high-pressure stream of bright blue water. The background features the dark silhouette of a ruined industrial structure against a fiery orange and red, smoky twilight sky. Dramatic lighting, high contrast, intense atmosphere, 9:16 aspect ratio.
negativePrompt: worst quality, low quality, cropped, normal quality, blurry, watermark, signature, text, error, missing limbs, deformed hands, extra fingers, cartoonish, messy, inaccurate anatomy, poorly drawn.
